statements: SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, read_permission FROM user_permissions WHERE write_permission = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE execute_permission = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, write_permission, read_permission FROM user_permissions WHERE write_permission = FALSE AND read_permission = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, read_permission, write_permission, execute_permission FROM user_permissions WHERE read_permission = TRUE OR write_permission = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, read_permission, write_permission, execute_permission FROM user_permissions WHERE read_permission = TRUE AND execute_permission = FALSE
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE write_permission = TRUE
SELECT user_id, write_permission FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT * FROM user_permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rows FROM user_permissions
SELECT user_id, permission_type, access_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 100 ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(data_value) AS total_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_type = 'admin' OR access_level = 'high';
SELECT user_id, AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY average_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_type = 'admin'
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY access_level DESC
SELECT sensor_id, data_value, measurement_time FROM sensor_data WHERE data_value > 50 ORDER BY measurement_time ASC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM sensor_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(data_value) < 100
SELECT * FROM user_permissions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT sensor_id, data_value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE access_level = 'restricted' ORDER BY revoked_at ASC;
SELECT access_id, user_id, granted_at FROM access_controls WHERE revoked_at IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT access_id, user_id, access_level FROM access_controls WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT data_id, sensor_id, data_value FROM sensor_data WHERE data_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin' ORDER BY updated_at DESC;
SELECT access_id, user_id, access_level FROM access_controls WHERE revoked_at IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50
SELECT sensor_name FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Temp%'
SELECT location_id, location_info FROM sensor_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC
SELECT access_id, access_level FROM access_controls
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT access_id, user_id, access_level FROM access_controls WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT data_id, sensor_name, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value BETWEEN 10.5 AND 15.5;
SELECT location_id, sensor_id, location_info FROM sensor_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'temp%' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM user_permissions ORDER BY permission_type ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, data_time, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT role_id, permission_type FROM role_permissions ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM user_permissions WHERE access_control = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS Total_Users FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_type, access_control FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = '1ec132d0-22e7-4d2b-8212-19a9758b79b1';
SELECT r.role_name, p.permission_type FROM user_roles_mapping AS urm JOIN user_roles AS r ON urm.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions AS p ON r.role_id = p.role_id;
